API Refrence¶

The following documentation defines all of the usable routes in the Zane API.

Warning

All routes use the base url of /api/v0/

Information Routes¶

This section outlines all of the routes used as information for the API.

GET /status¶

This returns the API’s current status.

Example Request:

GET /status HTTP

Example response:

HTTP 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{
    'code': 200
    'message': 'The API is functioning okay.'
}
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – The api is functioning correctly
  • 404 Not Found – The API functionality is currently disabled.

Image Manipulation¶

This section outlines all of the routs used for image manipulation.

POST /invert¶

This returns an inverted version of the input image. If the image is larger than 512px in width or height, the image will be sampled down to that 512px in the offending direction while preserving aspect ratio.

Example Request:

POST /invert HTTP
Accept: image/jpeg, image/png

Example response:

HTTP 200 OK
Content-Type: image/png

(image as bytes)
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Image manipulation is functioning correctly and has completed.
  • 404 Not Found – The API functionality is currently disabled.
  • 500 Internal Server Error – The current endpoint is currently broken due to internal errors.
POST /magic¶

This returns a content aware scaled version of the input image. If the image is larger than 512px in width or height, the image will be sampled down to that 512px in the offending direction while preserving aspect ratio.

Example Request:

POST /magic HTTP
Accept: image/jpeg, image/png

Example response:

HTTP 200 OK
Content-Type: image/png

(image as bytes)
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Image manipulation is functioning correctly and has completed.
  • 404 Not Found – The API functionality is currently disabled.
  • 500 Internal Server Error – The current endpoint is currently broken due to internal errors.
POST /deepfry¶

This returns a deepfried version of the input image. If the image is larger than 512px in width or height, the image will be sampled down to that 512px in the offending direction while preserving aspect ratio.

Example Request:

POST /deepfry HTTP
Accept: image/jpeg, image/png

Example response:

HTTP 200 OK
Content-Type: image/png

(image as bytes)
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Image manipulation is functioning correctly and has completed.
  • 404 Not Found – The API functionality is currently disabled.
  • 500 Internal Server Error – The current endpoint is currently broken due to internal errors.
POST /desat¶

This returns a desaturated version of the input image. If the image is larger than 512px in width or height, the image will be sampled down to that 512px in the offending direction while preserving aspect ratio.

Example Request:

POST /desat HTTP
Accept: image/jpeg, image/png

Example response:

HTTP 200 OK
Content-Type: image/png

(image as bytes)
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Image manipulation is functioning correctly and has completed.
  • 404 Not Found – The API functionality is currently disabled.
  • 500 Internal Server Error – The current endpoint is currently broken due to internal errors.
POST /noise¶

This returns a noisy version of the input image. If the image is larger than 512px in width or height, the image will be sampled down to that 512px in the offending direction while preserving aspect ratio.

Example Request:

POST /noise HTTP
Accept: image/jpeg, image/png

Example response:

HTTP 200 OK
Content-Type: image/png

(image as bytes)
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Image manipulation is functioning correctly and has completed.
  • 404 Not Found – The API functionality is currently disabled.
  • 500 Internal Server Error – The current endpoint is currently broken due to internal errors.
POST /color¶

This returns a differently colored version of the input image. If the image is larger than 512px in width or height, the image will be sampled down to that 512px in the offending direction while preserving aspect ratio.

The color arg is parsed by wand.color.Color and can use any of the listed formats on this page.

Example Request:

POST /color?color=blue HTTP
Accept: image/jpeg, image/png

Example response:

HTTP 200 OK
Content-Type: image/png

(image as bytes)
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Image manipulation is functioning correctly and has completed.
  • 404 Not Found – The API functionality is currently disabled.
  • 500 Internal Server Error – The current endpoint is currently broken due to internal errors.
